com.taobao.datax.common.util
类 StrUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.taobao.datax.common.util.StrUtils

public class StrUtils
extends java.lang.Object

A tool class which used to deal with strings. Usually unified the style of strings.

方法详细信息

changeDateFormat

public static java.lang.String changeDateFormat(java.lang.String dateString,
                                                java.lang.String srcFormat,
                                                java.lang.String destFormat)
Convert the string date to a particular format.

参数：
dateString - The String to operate on.
srcFormat - The date Format contained in the String.
destFormat - The format to be converted to.
返回：
Formatted Date String if successful, null otherwise.

convertTimeStampToDate

public static java.lang.String convertTimeStampToDate(java.lang.String dateString,
                                                      java.lang.String srcFormat,
                                                      java.lang.String destFormat)
This method converts the string timestamp to a date format by trimming of the time entry. And also returns back with requried format.

参数：
dateString - The String to operate on.
srcFormat - The date Format contained in the String.
destFormat - The format to be converted to.
返回：
Formatted Date String if successful, null otherwise.

replaceChars

public static java.lang.String replaceChars(java.lang.String old,
                                            char[] rchars)
replace some char in String NOTE: old cannot be null

参数：
old - String to be replaced
rchars - replace chars
返回：
String after being replaced.
